name: Heroes Chronicles translation pack
description: This mod contains various Heroes Chronicles translation files. Translation were incorporated from official localisations or using AI translation tools.
author: George King

1.0.0: Polish translation in Remake is hybrid, English translation in Remake Enhanced is hybrid, Czech completely made using Heroes Launcher translator tool
